availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Temple (Kenton, Kentucky, farmer and street contractor.)

body.p: Kenton, Kentucky, farmer and street contractor. Pennsylvania native. Married to Harriet Temple. Father to Pheba Temple, Evaline Temple, Harriet Temple, James M Temple. Street contractor in Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Kenton, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 38B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District No. 1, p. 494.
